text: Sulphur Springs is a city in Hopkins County, Texas, United States. The population of Sulphur Springs was 15,941 in 2020. Sulphur Springs was founded in 1854. == References == ==Other websites== *The city of Sulphur Springs Official website Category:Cities in Texas Category:County seats in Texas Category:1854 establishments in the United States Category:1850s establishments in Texas
title: Sulphur Springs, Texas
